Package rmi.clientserver.assignment1

Interface PriceWriterReader

All Superinterfaces:
java.rmi.Remote
All Known Implementing Classes:
PriceWriterReaderImpl
public interface PriceWriterReader
extends java.rmi.Remote
Interface PriceWriterReader of the remote object used by clients and server to communicate their offers and prices.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void clientHasPurchased()
    Method used by the server to increment the number of client's purchases whenever its offer is valid.
    int getOffer()
    Method used by the server to read client's offer.
    int getPrice()
    Method used by the client to read the server's price.
    int getPurchases()
    Method used to check how many purchases the client has successfully completed.
    int getState()
    Method used to check the client's state.
    void putOffer​(int p)
    Method used by the client to send its offer to the server.
    void putPrice​(int p)
    Method used by the server to send prices to the client.
    void setState​(int s)
    Method used to update the client's state.

  • Method Details

    • putPrice

      void putPrice​(int p) throws java.rmi.RemoteException
      Method used by the server to send prices to the client.
      Parameters:
      p - price sent.
      Throws:
      java.rmi.RemoteException - It handles exceptions that may occur during execution of a remote method call.

    • putOffer

      void putOffer​(int p) throws java.rmi.RemoteException
      Method used by the client to send its offer to the server.
      Parameters:
      p - client's offer
      Throws:
      java.rmi.RemoteException - It handles exceptions that may occur during execution of a remote method call.

    • getPrice

      int getPrice() throws java.rmi.RemoteException
      Method used by the client to read the server's price.
      Returns:
      server's price
      Throws:
      java.rmi.RemoteException - It handles exceptions that may occur during execution of a remote method call.

    • getOffer

      int getOffer() throws java.rmi.RemoteException
      Method used by the server to read client's offer.
      Returns:
      client's offer
      Throws:
      java.rmi.RemoteException - It handles exceptions that may occur during execution of a remote method call.

    • clientHasPurchased

      void clientHasPurchased() throws java.rmi.RemoteException
      Method used by the server to increment the number of client's purchases whenever its offer is valid.
      Throws:
      java.rmi.RemoteException - It handles exceptions that may occur during execution of a remote method call.

    • getPurchases

      int getPurchases() throws java.rmi.RemoteException
      Method used to check how many purchases the client has successfully completed.
      Returns:
      number of client's purchases
      Throws:
      java.rmi.RemoteException - It handles exceptions that may occur during execution of a remote method call.

    • getState

      int getState() throws java.rmi.RemoteException
      Method used to check the client's state. State is 0 when then client wants to make an offer. State is 1 when the purchase is successful. State is -1 when the purchase fails.
      Returns:
      client's state
      Throws:
      java.rmi.RemoteException - It handles exceptions that may occur during execution of a remote method call.

    • setState

      void setState​(int s) throws java.rmi.RemoteException
      Method used to update the client's state.
      Parameters:
      s - new client's state
      Throws:
      java.rmi.RemoteException - It handles exceptions that may occur during execution of a remote method call.
